fields.name: Unpatched Apache Server
fields.description: Public-facing server missing latest security updates.
fields.mitigation_plan: Apply latest patch and restrict access via firewall.

fields.name: Weak Password Policy
fields.description: Users allowed to set short or common passwords.

fields.name: Missing Audit Trail
fields.description: No logging of admin actions or data changes.
fields.mitigation_plan: Implement logging and regular audit reviews.

fields.name: Default Credentials in Production
fields.description: System still uses vendor-supplied default login.
fields.mitigation_plan: Disable default accounts and enforce credential rotation.

fields.name: No Backup Policy
fields.description: Critical data is not backed up regularly.
fields.mitigation_plan: Establish weekly backup schedule with offsite redundancy.
